rows.label: qev051512_MSG0001
rows.name:
You made a fine show of the strength that you also
used when you freed us sisters from our curse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0002
rows.name:
I apologize for hiding my identity from you, but there
are yet many in this city who still think ill of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0003
rows.name:
That's why I assumed the form of a BLADE when I
entered the contest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0004
rows.name:
I hope you will visit again when you have time?
It gets...quite lonely out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0005
rows.name: F-for Lyvia, that is. Not me. She misses you terribly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0006
rows.name:
You truly are strong. It is no wonder our mother still
fears you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0007
rows.name:
I apologize for hiding my identity from you, but there
are yet many in this city who still think ill of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0008
rows.name:
That's why I assumed the form of a BLADE when I
entered the contest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0009
rows.name:
It's humbling to admit, but our match taught me much.
I can only hope to possess your strength one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0010
rows.name: Strength enough to stop my mother's rages myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051512_MSG0011
rows.name:
I pray you will entrust that task to me,
for I will not permit it to trouble humans any further.[ST:wait ]
